hero.headline: Where Velocity, Meets Vision.
hero.subtitle: Crafting Your Story, At The Speed Of Now.
hero.description: Video production & advertising content for brands that want to stand out. From monthly social media to full-scale commercial productions — we become your strategic visual partner.

about.label: About Us
about.title: Crafting Stories, One Frame at a Time
about.description: Based in Vienna and Thessaloniki, we combine the speed of modern digital production with the quality standards of traditional cinematography.
about.text1: Devre Media was born from a simple belief: every brand deserves cinematic-quality content without the wait. We specialize in social media videos, corporate films, podcast production, and event coverage — delivering everything your brand needs to dominate on screen.
about.text2: Our lightweight, agile approach means we move fast without compromising quality. Where others take weeks, we deliver in days — because your brand can't afford to wait.
about.highlight2Desc: From strategy to final cut, all under one roof
about.highlight3Desc: We build partnerships, not just projects

approach.label: Our Approach
approach.title: The best of both worlds
approach.description: The market has two extremes: heavy-camera cinematographers who are slow and expensive, and phone-wielding content creators who sacrifice quality. We sit right in the middle.
approach.card1Desc: Lightweight, agile equipment means we shoot fast. In 1-2 filming days we produce an entire month's worth of content for your brand.
approach.card2Desc: Every frame follows real cinematography rules — composition, lighting, color grading. The result is content that looks and feels premium.
approach.card3Desc: We don't just point a camera. We plan content strategy, topics, filming schedules — we build your entire visual identity alongside you.
approach.quote: We stand next to our clients as people and partners, but we work with clear rules, contracts, and delivery timelines. Good accounts make good friends.

services.label: Services
services.title: Everything your brand needs on screen
services.socialDesc: Monthly packages of 4-20 videos per month. Brief, filming, editing, music, subtitles — all included.
services.podcastDesc: Full podcast setup with 3 cameras, professional editing, and short clips for social. From 2 to 6 episodes per month.
services.eventDesc: On-the-spot event content delivered the same day or by next morning. 3-5 polished videos. Drone included.
services.corporateDesc: Large-scale productions — brand films, TV-ready commercials, corporate presentations. Full scripting and post.
services.graphicDesc: Brand identity, social media graphics, thumbnails, and visual assets that complement your video content perfectly.
services.copyDesc: Compelling scripts, captions, and brand messaging that give your visual content the words it deserves.

portfolio.label: Portfolio
portfolio.title: Our Work Speaks for Itself
portfolio.description: A selection of our recent productions — from exhibitions and corporate films to social media content and beyond.
portfolio.watchOnYoutube: Watch more on our YouTube channel

process.label: Process
process.title: From first call to final cut
process.description: A clear, professional process. No surprises, no guesswork.
process.step1Desc: We learn your business, goals, competitors, and vision. 30-45 minutes to understand exactly what you need.
process.step2Desc: We propose 1-2 packages tailored to you, plan topics and content calendar, and lock in filming dates.
process.step3Desc: In just 1-2 days of filming (up to 6 hours each), we capture enough material for your entire month.
process.step4Desc: Professional editing, color grading, music, and subtitles. Delivered within 7 business days with 1 revision round.

work.label: Results
work.title: Brands that trust us
work.mavriDesc: Full-scale content partnership: 60 reels, 3 vlogs, and 6 podcast episodes per month. The go-to brand powerhouse in the Thessaloniki food scene.
work.technomatDesc: Started with 4 videos per month. Scaled to 8 videos per month within months due to strong performance and audience growth.
work.ophthalmicaDesc: 8 videos per month building the image of a cutting-edge medical clinic. Professional, trust-building content for the healthcare industry.
work.alsoWorking: Also working with Almeco, MotoMarket, Sky Venue, UFC, AJP, REMAX Hellas and more.

team.label: Our Team
team.title: The People Behind the Lens
team.description: A small, dedicated team that treats every project as our own.
team.harisBio: Master of post-production with an eye for cinematic storytelling. Haris transforms raw footage into compelling visual narratives that captivate audiences and elevate brands.
team.angelosBio: The strategic mind behind Devre Media. Angelos handles client relationships, content strategy, and ensures every project exceeds expectations from brief to final cut.

pricing.label: Packages
pricing.title: Transparent pricing, real results
pricing.description: Monthly packages designed for consistency. Minimum 3-month commitment — because real brand building takes time.
pricing.podcastDesc: 2 to 6 episodes/month. 3-camera setup, full editing, short clips for social media promotion.
pricing.eventDesc: 3-5 polished videos from your event, delivered same-day or by next morning. Perfect for launches, openings, and galas.
pricing.customNote: Corporate films, commercials, and custom productions quoted on request. 50/50 payment terms.

whyUs.label: Why Us
whyUs.title: Not just a camera crew
whyUs.description: We're moving toward a full agency model — taking over your entire visual identity across social media, YouTube, website, and beyond.
whyUs.cinematicDesc: Every piece of content follows professional cinematography rules. Your brand deserves more than phone-shot clips.
whyUs.speedDesc: Lightweight setup means fast production. Social and podcasts delivered in 7 business days. Events same-day.
whyUs.partnershipDesc: We prefer annual collaborations over one-off projects. We invest in understanding your brand deeply.
whyUs.termsDesc: Contracts, defined revision rounds, transparent payment schedules. Professional from day one.
whyUs.strategyDesc: We plan topics, shooting scripts, and posting calendars together. We think about your growth, not just footage.
whyUs.droneDesc: Aerial footage comes standard in our packages. It's not an upsell — it's part of the experience.

contact.label: Get in Touch
contact.title: Let's Create Something Together
contact.description: Have a project in mind? We'd love to hear about it. Fill out the form or reach us directly.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your project, goals, and timeline...
contact.success: Message sent! We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
contact.error: Failed to send. Please email us at devremedia@gmail.com

cta.description: Let's sit down for 30 minutes and map out a content plan that actually makes sense for your business. No pushy sales — just an honest conversation about where your brand can go.
cta.location: Vienna & Thessaloniki. Available for projects across Europe and internationally.

footer.tagline: Video production & advertising content. Building complete brand images since day one.
